name: Bonkers [SNES]
description:
If you enjoy our work, please consider supporting us on Patreon!

(originally made in 48 hours for the 35th gm(48) game jam, with some post-jam fixes and changes)

Brawler-platformer action! Dr. Onion has ripped a bunch of holes in space in order to kidnap Apple's beloved dog! Help Apple get her dog back and give Dr. Onion a whoopin'! What are the controls? Keyboard

MOVE ................................................. Left/Right arrow keys, A/D

JUMP ................................................................................... SPACE, Z

PUNCH LEFT/RIGHT ................................................. Q/E, J/K, X/C

AIM UP/DOWN ................................ Up/Down arrow keys, W/S

INTERACT ............................................................. Up arrow key, W

Xbox Controller (recommended)

MOVE ...................................... Left stick horizontal, Left/Right D-pad buttons

JUMP ............................................................................................................................ A

PUNCH LEFT/RIGHT ................... X/B, Right/Left trigger, Right/Left bumper

AIM UP/DOWN ........................... Left stick vertical, Up/Down D-pad buttons

INTERACT .............................................................. Left stick up, Up D-pad button
